## Load Google Sheet into `plot_labels`

* Google Sheet: [CalCOFI plot_labels - Google Sheets](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ghM30pIdcsun7XWzLRKh4EilUplN60YdHayfiilPFwE/edit?pli=1#gid=0)

```{r plot_labels}
# packages
source(here::here("libs/db.R")) # defines variables: con, dir_gdrive
librarian::shelf(
  googlesheets4, knitr, purrr)

# google sheet
gsheet <- "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ghM30pIdcsun7XWzLRKh4EilUplN60YdHayfiilPFwE/edit"

# no need to authenticate since shared for anyone to view
gs4_deauth() 

# read data
d <- read_sheet(gsheet)

# check that variables are globally unique
stopifnot(d$variable %>% duplicated() %>% sum() == 0)

# check that table.variable exists in the database
d <- d %>% 
  mutate(
    exists = map2_lgl(
      table, variable, function(tbl, var){
        flds <- dbListFields(con, tbl) %>% sort()
        var %in% flds }))
stopifnot(all(d$exists))

# write to database
d %>% 
  select(-exists) %>% 
  dbWriteTable(con, "plot_labels", ., overwrite=T)

# show table
kable(d)
```
